title: Grizzly bear

properties.name: description
properties.value: Grizzly bears are large but relatively weak monsters typically found in forests. They are the stronger, aggressive cousins of the non-aggressive black bear.

Grizzly bears are large but relatively weak monsters typically found in forests. They are the stronger, aggressive cousins of the non-aggressive black bear.

Contents

  • 1 Locations
  • 2 Drops
    • 2.1 100%
    • 2.2 Tertiary
    • 2.3 Wilderness Slayer tertiary
  • 3 Changes
    • 3.1 Gallery (historical)

Drops[edit | edit source]

The following drop rates are provided by Jagex, unless otherwise specified.

The average Grizzly bear kill is worth 479.05.

100%[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Bones1Always690
Bear fur1Always1356
Raw bear meat1Always2400

Tertiary[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Bear ribs(m)1Always[d 1]Not soldN/A
Looting bag(m)11/7[d 2]Not soldN/A
Ensouled bear head(m)11/25642156
Clue scroll (beginner)11/90Not sold12
  1. Bear ribs are only dropped during Rag and Bone Man I.
  2. Looting bags are only dropped by those found in the Wilderness.

Wilderness Slayer tertiary[edit | edit source]

The following drops are only accessible while on a Slayer task given by Krystilia.

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Larran's key(m)11/1,144Not sold54
Slayer's enchantment(m)11/2992,747720

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
18 October 2006
(update)

The level 21 variant was renamed from "Bear" to "Grizzly bear".

5 July
19 September 2005

The combat level of the Isafdar variant was increased from 24 to 42.
